the current master branch should work, now. Many thanks Vitaly!

You may want to modify the setpermissions tasks by adding nonPosixMode="tryDosOrFail" to make 1.10.1's bootstrap work for you.

It seems we are not properly trying to bootstrap Ant within our Windows Jenkins builds.
